channel.title: How to i make pk reward items unpickupable?
channel.description: Hello guys if any one can help me i have only just started to code and im coding Demises edge pvp source im making it a pickup but i would like to know how i would make the rar and pvp reward items non pickup please help! thanks :|

item.title: How to i make pk reward items unpickupable?
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

Like David said, create an array with the items you don’t want people to be able to pick up.

item.title: How to i make pk reward items unpickupable?
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

well this is my pickup command

        if(command.startsWith("pickup")) {
            try {
                string[] split = command.split(" ");
                int itemID = Integer.parseInt(split[1]);
                int itemAmount = 1;
                try {
                        itemAmount = integer.parseInt(split[2]);
                } catch (Exception e) {
                    itemAmount = 1;
                }
        if(itemID != PkItemID || itemID != NextPkItemID) { // add the pk items here
                if(itemID >= 25000) {
                        sM("No Such item noob");
                } else {
                        addItem(itemID, itemAmount);
                }
        }
} catch (Exception e) {
        sM("syntax error! type ::pickup 995 20");
        }
}

Read full topic

item.title: How to i make pk reward items unpickupable?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:1, topic:340095”]Ignore me if this doesn’t work, i’m not a coding genius either, but i’ll give it a try:

if(command.startsWith("pickup(pvp item ID){ sendMessage("You can't spawn PVP items!"); {

I’ll removed this if it fails or something. Just remember to compile it after.[/quote]Rofl.

@OP -

Just create an array and use an enhanced for loop to look through it.
